title: EU farming unions warn that carbon border adjustment mechanism resolution (CBAM) could negatively impact fertilizer prices
author: unknown
text: EU farming unions warn that carbon border adjustment mechanism resolution (CBAM) could negatively impact fertilizer prices Copa and Cogeca have expressed concerns over an amendment to the proposed EU carbon border adjustment mechanism (CBAM), fearing that it will make fertilizer prices skyrocket.
excerpt: Copa and Cogeca have expressed concerns over an amendment to the proposed EU carbon border adjustment mechanism (CBAM), fearing that it will make fertilizer prices skyrocket.
